events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: Ensuring high-quality materials and cleanliness in all steps is crucial for the desired cell performance in lithium-ion battery manufacturing.
events.description: Ensuring high-quality materials and cleanliness in all steps is crucial for the desired cell performance in lithium-ion battery manufacturing.

events.name: Material Purity
events.wd_description: High-quality materials, known as battery grade, are necessary for lithium-ion battery manufacturing.
events.description: High-quality materials, known as battery grade, are necessary for lithium-ion battery manufacturing.

events.name: Material Necessity Rankings
events.wd_description: Rankings indicate the necessity of high-purity materials varies among different materials.
events.description: Rankings indicate the necessity of high-purity materials varies among different materials.

events.name: Product Supply Assessment
events.wd_description: High purity material requirements make product supply assessment critical for manufacturers.
events.description: High purity material requirements make product supply assessment critical for manufacturers.

events.name: ply Disruption Potential
events.wd_description: Assessment of product supply is critical due to the high purity material requirement.
events.description: Assessment of product supply is critical due to the high purity material requirement.

events.name: Supply Disruption Risk
events.wd_description: High risk of supply disruption for cobalt, nickel, and separators due to reliance on specific geographical areas.
events.description: High risk of supply disruption for cobalt, nickel, and separators due to reliance on specific geographical areas.

events.name: Cobalt Supply Risk
events.wd_description: Cobalt supply is identified as the most critical issue due to dependence on the D.R. of Congo.
events.description: Cobalt supply is identified as the most critical issue due to dependence on the D.R. of Congo.

events.name: alt Refineries
events.wd_description: Refineries highly depend on cobalt supply from the D.R. of Congo, increasing supply risk.
events.description: Refineries highly depend on cobalt supply from the D.R. of Congo, increasing supply risk.

events.name: Geographical Dependency
events.wd_description: Dependency on unique materials from specific geographical areas affects flexibility in supplier selection.
events.description: Dependency on unique materials from specific geographical areas affects flexibility in supplier selection.

events.name: Geopolitical Risk
events.wd_description: Geopolitical risks cover the entire supply chain and impact material supply to the manufacturing facility.
events.description: Geopolitical risks cover the entire supply chain and impact material supply to the manufacturing facility.

events.name: Political Instability Assessment
events.wd_description: Risk assessed based on material-related political instabilities.
events.description: Risk assessed based on material-related political instabilities.

events.name: pter 4.3.2
events.wd_description: Political instabilities are reviewed in Chapter 4.3.2.
events.description: Political instabilities are reviewed in Chapter 4.3.2.

events.name: ert Interviews
events.wd_description: Input for geopolitical risk derived from expert interviews.
events.description: Input for geopolitical risk derived from expert interviews.

events.name: Purchasing Flexibility Measurement
events.wd_description: Measurement of purchasing flexibility includes make-or-buy opportunities and storage risks.
events.description: Measurement of purchasing flexibility includes make-or-buy opportunities and storage risks.

events.name: al Ranking Evaluation
events.wd_description: The two perspectives are weighted together in the total ranking evaluation shown in Table 5.3.
events.description: The two perspectives are weighted together in the total ranking evaluation shown in Table 5.3.
